solution_line_template: The amount spent on mango juice is {total_spent} - {spent_on_pineapple} = <<{total_spent}-{spent_on_pineapple}={spent_on_mango}>>{spent_on_mango} dollars

Dividing the {spent_on_mango} dollars by the cost of a glass of mango juice gives us {spent_on_mango}/{cost_mango_juice} = <<{spent_on_mango}/{cost_mango_juice}={num_people_mango}>>{num_people_mango} people

Since a glass of pineapple juice goes for ${cost_pineapple_juice}, the number that ordered is {spent_on_pineapple}/{cost_pineapple_juice} = <<{spent_on_pineapple}/{cost_pineapple_juice}={num_people_pineapple}>>{num_people_pineapple} people
Adding both numbers gives a total of {num_people_mango} + {num_people_pineapple} =<<{num_people_mango}+{num_people_pineapple}={total_people}>>{total_people} people
